titles.title: Hunger Relief Trucking Tax Credit Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a tax credit for the transportation of food for charitable purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S7073-7074)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
6/5/2007--Introduced.
Hunger Relief Trucking Tax Credit Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a tax credit for the cost of transporting food to assist hunger relief efforts of certain charitable organizations.
